column2: Should I be disappointed or satisfied
column3: Hi everyone my family and I have been to the movies recently I took my adorable kids to see the secret life of pets 2 we got front row seats and I have never been to this theater before we did pay a little more than the other seats do I thought they should be really good I have to admit they had a little bit of a blurry screen but my kids had a good time so I donâ€™t know what to thinkThank you everyone for listening love to everyone
